thread.title: BRIEF-The Habit Restaurants Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.03

title: BRIEF-The Habit Restaurants Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
The Habit Restaurants Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.03 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Habit Restaurants Inc:
* THE HABIT RESTAURANTS, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $91.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $93.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $389 MILLION TO $393 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $43.0 MILLION TO $46.0 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03, REVENUE VIEW $93.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
